description.english: Unlock all achievements
description.french: Débloquez tous les trophées
description.italian: Sblocca tutti i traguardi
description.spanish: Desbloquear todos los logros
description.schinese: 获得全部成就
description.tchinese: 獲得全部成就
description.japanese: 全ての実績を獲得する
description.dutch: Speel alle achievements vrij
description.brazilian: Desbloqueie todas as conquistas
description.indonesian: Buka semua penghargaan

description.english: Play Holo Awase for the first time (Single Player or Multiplayer)
description.french: Jouez en Jeu holo pour la première fois (Solo ou Multijoueur)
description.italian: Gioca all'Holo awase per la prima volta (Partita individuale o Multigiocatore)
description.koreana: "다 함께 플레이" 또는 "혼자서 플레이"에서 홀로 맞추기를 처음으로 플레이
description.spanish: Jugar a Holo-awase por primera vez (Un jugador o Multijugador)
description.schinese: 在「单人游戏」或「多人游戏」中第一次玩「holo合」
description.tchinese: 初次在「多人遊玩」或「單人遊玩」中遊玩「holo花合」
description.japanese: 「みんなでプレイ」か「ひとりでプレイ」で「ホロあわせ」を初めてプレイする
description.dutch: Speel Holo Awase voor het eerst (Single-player of multiplayer)
description.brazilian: Jogue Holo Awase pela primeira vez (um jogador ou multijogador)
description.indonesian: Mainkan Holo Awase untuk pertama kali (Single Player atau Multiplayer.)

description.english: Play 10 games of Holo Awase (Single Player or Multiplayer)
description.french: Jouez 10 parties en Jeu holo (Solo ou Multijoueur)

description.brazilian: Jogue 10 partidas de Holo Awase (um jogador ou multijogador)
description.indonesian: Mainkan Holo Awase 10 kali (Single Player atau Multiplayer.)

description.english: Form the Five Lights hand in Koi-Koi (Single Player or Multiplayer)
description.german: Bilde die Fünf-Lichter-Hand bei Koi-Koi (Einzel- oder Mehrspieler)
description.french: Formez la main Cinq lumières en Koi-koi (Solo ou Multijoueur)
description.italian: Realizza il set Cinque luci nel Koi-koi (Partita individuale o Multigiocatore)

description.spanish: Formar la mano Cinco luces en Koi-koi (Un jugador o Multijugador)
description.schinese: 在「单人游戏」或「多人游戏」中玩「来来」，组成五光
description.tchinese: 「多人遊玩」或「單人遊玩」中遊玩「來來」並組成五光牌型
description.japanese: 「みんなでプレイ」か「ひとりでプレイ」で「こいこい」をプレイして、五光を成立させる

description.indonesian: Kumpulkan set kartu Kilau Cahaya di Koi-koi (Single Player atau Multiplayer.)

description.english: Form all Holo Sets in Holo Awase (Single Player or Multiplayer)
description.german: Bilde alle Holo-Sets bei Holo-Awase (Einzel- oder Mehrspieler)
description.french: Formez toutes les holocombinaisons en Jeu holo (Solo ou Multijoueur)

description.schinese: 在「单人游戏」或「多人游戏」中玩「holo合」，组成全部holo役
description.tchinese: 「多人遊玩」或「單人遊玩」中遊玩「holo花合」並組成所有holo牌型

description.brazilian: Forme todos os conjuntos holo em Holo Awase (um jogador ou multijogador)
description.indonesian: Buat semua Holo Set di Holo Awase (Single Player atau Multiplayer.)

description.english: End a Flower Awase game with 200+ points (Single Player or Multiplayer)
description.german: Beende ein Blumen-Awase-Spiel mit 200+ Punkten (Einzel- oder Mehrspieler)
description.french: Terminez une partie de Jeu floral avec 200+ points (Solo ou Multijoueur)
description.italian: Termina una partita di Fiore awase con 200+ punti (Partita individuale o Multigiocatore)
description.koreana: "다 함께 플레이" 또는 "혼자서 플레이"에서 "꽃 맞추기"를 플레이해서 대전 종료 시에 총 득점 200점 이상 획득
description.spanish: Terminar una partida de Hana-awase con 200+ puntos (Un jugador o Multijugador)
description.schinese: 在「单人游戏」或「多人游戏」中玩「花合」，在最终回合结束时总得分超过200分
description.tchinese: 「多人遊玩」或「單人遊玩」中遊玩「holo花合」並在牌局結束時總分獲得200以上
description.japanese: 「みんなでプレイ」か「ひとりでプレイ」で「花あわせ」をプレイして、対戦終了時の得点を200点以上獲得する
description.dutch: Eindig een Flower Awase match met 200+ punten (Single-player of multiplayer)
description.brazilian: Termine um jogo de Hana Awase com 200+ pontos (um jogador ou multijogador)
description.indonesian: Akhiri game Flower Awase dengan 200+ poin (Single Player atau Multiplayer.)

description.english: End an Oicho-Kabu game with 6,000+ points (Single Player or Multiplayer)
description.german: Beende ein Oichi-Kabu-Spiel mit 6.000+ Punkten (Einzel- oder Mehrspieler)
description.french: Terminez une partie d'Oicho-Kabu avec 6000+ points (Solo ou Multijoueur)
description.italian: Termina una partita di Oicho-kabu con 6.000+ punti (Partita individuale o Multigiocatore)
description.koreana: "다 함께 플레이" 또는 "혼자서 플레이"에서 "오이초카부"를 플레이해서 대전 종료 시에 총 득점 6,000점 이상 획득
description.spanish: Terminar una partida de Oicho-kabu con 6000+ puntos (Un jugador o Multijugador)
description.schinese: 在「单人游戏」或「多人游戏」中玩「追丁株」，在最终回合结束时总得分超过6000分
description.tchinese: 「多人遊玩」或「單人遊玩」中遊玩「追丁株」並在牌局結束時獲得總分6000以上
description.japanese: 「みんなでプレイ」か「ひとりでプレイ」で「おいちょかぶ」をプレイして、対戦終了時の得点を6,000点以上獲得する
description.dutch: Eindig een Oicho-Kabu match met 6.000+ punten (Single-player of multiplayer)
description.brazilian: Termine um jogo de Oicho-Kabu com 6.000+ pontos (um jogador ou multijogador)
description.indonesian: Akhiri game Oicho Kabu dengan 6.000+ poin (Single Player atau Multiplayer.)

description.english: Form a set in Koi-Koi (Single Player or Multiplayer)
description.german: Bilde bei Koi-Koi einen Satz (Einzel- oder Mehrspieler)
description.french: Formez une combinaison en Koi-koi (Solo ou Multijoueur)
description.italian: Realizza un set in una partita di Koi-koi (Partita individuale o Multigiocatore)
description.koreana: "다 함께 플레이" 또는 "혼자서 플레이"에서 "코이코이"를 플레이해서 족보 만들기

description.schinese: 在「单人游戏」或「多人游戏」中玩「来来」，组成役
description.tchinese: 「多人遊玩」或「單人遊玩」中遊玩「來來」並組成牌型
description.japanese: 「みんなでプレイ」か「ひとりでプレイ」で「こいこい」をプレイして、出来役を成立させる
description.dutch: Vorm een set in Koi-Koi  (Single-player of multiplayer)
description.brazilian: Forme um conjunto em Koi-Koi (um jogador ou multijogador)
description.indonesian: Buat Set dalam Koi-Koi (Single Player atau Multiplayer.)

description.english: Form a holo set in Holo Awase (Single Player or Multiplayer)

description.brazilian: Forme um conjunto holo em Holo Awase (um jogador ou multijogador)
description.indonesian: Buat Set holo di Holo Awase (Single Player atau Multiplayer.)

description.english: Win a Koi-Koi or Holo Awase round within 2 turns (Single Player or Multiplayer)
description.german: Gewinne eine Runde Koi-Koi oder Holo-Awase in 2 Zügen (Einzel- oder Mehrspieler)
description.french: Gagnez une manche (Koi-koi ou Jeu holo) en 2 tours (Solo ou Multijoueur)
description.italian: Vinci un round di Koi-koi o Holo awase in 2 turni (Partita individuale o Multigiocatore)
description.koreana: "다 함께 플레이" 또는 "혼자서 플레이"에서 "코이코이" 또는 "홀로 맞추기"를 플레이해서 2턴 이내로 라운드 승리
description.spanish: Ganar una ronda de Koi-koi (Un jugador o Multijugador)
description.schinese: 在「单人游戏」或「多人游戏」中玩「来来」或「holo合」，于2回合之内赢得该轮
description.tchinese: 「多人遊玩」或「單人遊玩」中遊玩「來來」或「holo花合」並在2回合內贏得牌局
description.japanese: 「みんなでプレイ」か「ひとりでプレイ」で「こいこい」または「ホロあわせ」をプレイして、2ターン以内にラウンドに勝利する
description.dutch: Win Koi-Koi of Holo Awase binnen de 2 beurten (Single-player of multiplayer)
description.brazilian: Vença um jogo de Koi-Koi ou Holo Awase em 2 turnos (um jogador ou multijogador)
description.indonesian: Menangkan ronde Koi-Koi atau Holo Awase dalam 2 kali jalan (Single Player atau Multiplayer.)

description.english: Play and win a game of Koi-Koi (Single Player or Multiplayer)
description.german: Spiele & gewinne eine Partie Koi-Koi (Einzel- oder Mehrspieler)
description.french: Jouez et gagnez une partie de Koi-koi (Solo ou Multijoueur)
description.italian: Gioca e vinci una partita di Koi-koi (Partita individuale o Multigiocatore)

description.spanish: Jugar y ganar una partida de Koi-koi (Un jugador o Multijugador)
description.schinese: 在「单人游戏」或「多人游戏」中玩「来来」并获胜
description.tchinese: 「多人遊玩」或「單人遊玩」中遊玩「來來」並獲勝
description.japanese: 「みんなでプレイ」か「ひとりでプレイ」で「こいこい」をプレイして、勝利する
description.dutch: Speel en win een Koi-Koi-match  (Single-player of multiplayer)
description.brazilian: Jogue e vença uma partida de Koi-Koi (um jogador ou multijogador)
description.indonesian: Main dan menangkan 1 game Koi-koi (Single Player atau Multiplayer.)

description.english: Get 1st in a 3 and 4 player Flower Awase game (Single Player or Multiplayer)
description.german: Werde 1. in einer 3- und 4-Spieler-Partie Blumen-Awase (Einzel- oder Mehrspieler)
description.french: Terminez 1er en Jeu floral à 3 ou 4 joueurs (Solo ou Multijoueur)
description.italian: Arriva 1° a Fiore awase a 3 e 4 giocatori (Partita individuale o Multigiocatore)
description.koreana: "다 함께 플레이" 또는 "혼자서 플레이"에서 "꽃 맞추기"를 플레이해서 3, 4인 모드 전부 1위로 승리
description.spanish: Quedar el 1º en una partida de Hana-awase de 3 y 4 jugadores (Un jugador o Multijugador)
description.schinese: 在「单人游戏」或「多人游戏」中玩「花合」，以3人和4人进行游戏，并以第一名获胜
description.tchinese: 「多人遊玩」或「單人遊玩」中遊玩「花合」並在3人和4人的對戰中獲得第1名
description.japanese: 「みんなでプレイ」か「ひとりでプレイ」で「花あわせ」をプレイして、参加人数3人と4人の両方で1位になる
description.dutch: Eindig als 1ste in een Flower Awase match met 3 of 4 (Single-player of multiplayer)
description.brazilian: Fique em 1º em um Hana Awase de 3 e 4 jogadores (um jogador ou multijogador)
description.indonesian: Juara satu di game Flower Awase dengan 3 dan 4 pemain (Single Player atau Multiplayer.)

description.japanese: 「みんなでプレイ」か「ひとりでプレイ」で「おいちょかぶ」をプレイして、1位になる

description.spanish: Formar un conjunto en Oicho-Kabu (Un jugador o Multijugador)
description.schinese: 在「单人游戏」或「多人游戏」中玩「追丁株」，组成役
description.tchinese: 「多人遊玩」或「單人遊玩」中遊玩「追丁株」並組成牌型
description.japanese: 「みんなでプレイ」か「ひとりでプレイ」で「おいちょかぶ」をプレイして、出来役を成立させる
description.dutch: Maak een set in Oicho-Kabu  (Single-player of multiplayer)
description.brazilian: Forme um conjunto em Oicho-Kabu (um jogador ou multijogador)
description.indonesian: Buat Set di Oicho-Kabu (Single Player atau Multiplayer.)

description.english: Complete "[Opening] Holo's ???"
description.french: Terminez « [Opening] La Coupe quoi... ? »
description.italian: Completa "Prologo - ??? hololive"
description.spanish: Completar «[Prólogo] La copa que...»
description.schinese: 通关「【开幕】hololive的？？？」
description.tchinese: 過關「【開幕】holo的？？？」

description.dutch: "[Opening] Holo's wat???" uitgespeeld
description.brazilian: Conclua "[Abertura] Copa o quê?"
description.indonesian: Selesaikan "[Pembukaan} Holo???"

description.english: Complete "[Swept] That's All of Them!"
description.french: Terminez « [Du propre] Le compte est bon ! »
description.italian: Completa "Combo - Vittorie al completo!"
description.spanish: Completar «[Barrida] ¡Ya están todas!»
description.schinese: 通关「【全胜】收集齐了」
description.tchinese: 過關「【全勝】收集完成」
description.japanese: 「【全勝】収集完了」をクリアする
description.dutch: "[Met de vloer geveegd] Opgeruimd staat netjes!" uitgespeeld
description.brazilian: Conclua "[Vitóriaa] Deu conta de tudo!"
description.indonesian: Selesaikan "[Sapu Bersih] Kelar Semua!"

description.english: Complete "[Opening] Holo's Hanafuda Cup!"
description.french: Terminez « [Opening] Coupe hololive Hanafuda ! »
description.italian: Completa "Epilogo - La Coppa hololive Hanafuda!"
description.spanish: Completar «[Apertura] ¡Copa de hololive hanafuda!»
description.schinese: 通关「【开幕】Holo's花札杯！」
description.tchinese: 過關「【開幕】holo的花牌盃」
description.japanese: 「【開幕】ホロの花札杯！」をクリアする
description.dutch: "[Opening] Holo's Hanafuda-beker!" uitgespeeld
description.brazilian: Conclua "[Abertura] Copa de Hanafuda Holo!"
description.indonesian: Selesaikan "[Pembukaan] Holo Hanafuda Cup!"

displayName.schinese: 在异世界也能保持常态

description.english: Complete "[Special Ep?!] Tasty in Any World"
description.french: Terminez « [Ép spécial !?] Savoureux partout »
description.italian: Completa "Episodio speciale - Pranzo al sacco"
description.spanish: Completar «[¿Capi especial?] ¡Siempre sabroso!»
description.schinese: 通关「【特别篇？！】在异世界也要好好享受」
description.tchinese: 過關「【特別篇！？】在異世界也請享用」

description.indonesian: Selesaikan "[Ep Spesial?!] Lezat Lintas Dunia"

description.english: Complete "[Break Time] Bento Nom Nom"
